comments:
I have a manifest file (manifest_file) as a part of my project, located in .
settings folder. When I open eclipse I got an error message and the .log file 
shows:

--8<---
!ENTRY org.eclipse.jdt.ui 4 2 2005-09-03 20:47:40.95
!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.jdt.
ui".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ProjectPreferences.
computeChildren(ProjectPreferences.java:576)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ProjectPreferences.
<init>(ProjectPreferences.java:112)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ProjectPreferences.
internalCreate(ProjectPreferences.java:188)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.preferences.EclipsePreferences.
create(EclipsePreferences.java:288)
--8<---

Seems like the org.eclipse.core.resources_3.1.0.jar has a bug in class 
ProjectPreferences class located in folder:
plugins\org.eclipse.core.resources\src\org\eclipse\core\internal\resources\

The piece of code in private String[] computeChildren()

			if (resource.getType() == IResource.FILE && resource.getFullPath().
getFileExtension().equals(PREFS_FILE_EXTENSION))

fails with Null pointer extension if a file has no extension. I corrected the 
bug changing the code to:

			if (resource.getType() == IResource.FILE && PREFS_FILE_EXTENSION.
equals(resource.getFullPath().getFileExtension())) 

the PREFS_FILE_EXTENSION is always non-null so will never fail ;-).

Cheers

I will fix it... There's even a quick assist to fix this (Ctrl+1 when cursor is
on the equals method).

I have released to my development branch (not HEAD). I will leave this open
until it is fixed in HEAD.

(In reply to comment #2)
> I have released to my development branch (not HEAD). I will leave this open
> until it is fixed in HEAD.

How do you develop eclipse source in the eclipse platform? How do I import/open 
an eclipse project?

Thanks,

Y
This fix has been released to HEAD.
